Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Effect

Interface Effect

All Known Implementing Classes:
DiscountEffect, MarbleEffect, ProductionEffect, WarehouseEffect
public interface Effect
Effect class defines an interface for all kind of effects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attachMarket​(Market market)
    Attach the market.
    void attachResourceManager​(ResourceManager resourceManager)
    Attach the resource manager.
    void doEffect​(PlayerState playerState)
    Perform the effect's action.
    EffectData toEffectData()
    Return an EffectData based on the effect type and attributes.

  • Method Details

    • doEffect

      void doEffect​(PlayerState playerState) throws NotEnoughRequirementException
      Perform the effect's action.
      Parameters:
      playerState - defines the state of the turn, it controls which effect are going to be executed as mentioned below. (PRODUCTION_STATE -> ProductionEffect) (MARKET_STATE -> MarbleEffect) (CREATION_STATE -> DiscountEffect and WarehouseEffect)
      Throws:
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough card or resources to satisfy all requirements of the effect.

    • attachMarket

      void attachMarket​(Market market)
      Attach the market.
      Parameters:
      market - the market of the game.

    • attachResourceManager

      void attachResourceManager​(ResourceManager resourceManager)
      Attach the resource manager.
      Parameters:
      resourceManager - the resource manager of the player.

    • toEffectData

      EffectData toEffectData()
      Return an EffectData based on the effect type and attributes.
      Returns:
      an EffectData based on the effect type and attributes.
